game.name: Bloodmatch
game.shortDescription: The arena beckons. Sharpen your steel. Slash, stab, and spear your way through the ranks of Rome’s toughest warriors, taking yourself from a lowly pit slave to the land's most glorified gladiator. Your audience awaits…
game.shortDescriptionEn: The arena beckons. Sharpen your steel. Slash, stab, and spear your way through the ranks of Rome’s toughest warriors, taking yourself from a lowly pit slave to the land's most glorified gladiator. Your audience awaits…
